original_text: People will continue to give me honour. Each day I will have new strength.” People will continue to give me honour. Each day I will have new strength.” People will continue to give me honour.
korean_text: 내 영광은 내게 새로워지고 내 손에서 내 화살이 끊이지 않았노라

sentences.original_text: People will continue to give me honour
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 계속해서 나에게 존경을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Each day I will have new strength
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 나는 새로운 힘을 얻을 것입니다
